2,Navigate to Home and Verify Page,"Access the home page, hover over items, click a mobile brand link, and verify navigation back to the home page.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Hover over item object
Step 3: Click on link mobileBrand (Samsung) -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 4: Click on footer contentInfo -> Navigate to page ''

1,Complete Order Process for Apple Product,Navigate to the home page, select an Apple product, enter shipping details, and complete the order process.","Step 1: Navigate to /

Step 5: Enter shipping details and complete the order process

6,Complete Order with Detailed Shipping Information,Navigate to the home page, select a product, enter detailed shipping information, and complete the order process.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on link mobileBrand (iPhone15Plus) -> Navigate to page 'product/*'
Step 3: Click on label storageColorOption (256GB)
Step 4: Click on label yellow -> Navigate to page '/cart'
Step 5: Click on button Increased -> Navigate to page 'checkout/info'
Step 6: Hover over div CheckoutInfo
Step 7: Click on input Email
Step 8: Enter input value in input Email
Step 9: Click on button ContinueToShipping -> Navigate to page 'checkout/shipping-address'
Step 10: Hover over div CheckoutShippingAddress
Step 11: Click on input FirstName
Step 12: Hover over div CheckoutShippingAddress2
Step 13: Enter input value in input FirstName
Step 14: Click on input Address
Step 15: Hover over div CheckoutShippingAddress3
Step 16: Enter input value in input Address
Step 17: Click on input LastName
Step 18: Hover over div CheckoutShippingAddress4
Step 19: Enter input value in input LastName
Step 20: Click on input ZipCode
Step 21: Hover over div CheckoutShippingAddress5
Step 22: Click on input State
Step 23: Enter input value in input ZipCode
Step 24: Hover over div CheckoutShippingAddress6
Step 25: Enter input value in input State
Step 26: Click on input ShippingCity
Step 27: Hover over div CheckoutShippingAddress7
Step 28: Enter input value in input ShippingCity
Step 29: Click on input Phone
Step 30: Enter input value in input Phone
Step 31: Click on button ContinueToPayment -> Navigate to page 'checkout/payment'
Step 32: Click on button CompleteOrder -> Navigate to page 'thank-you/*'
Step 33: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
